Config.Name: Web UI for solving CAPTCHAs manually
Config.Description: Port for web UI and API access. Use this to manually solve CAPTCHAs if not using SponsorsHelper.

Config.Name: Config folder
Config.Description: Persistent configuration storage for Quasarr settings and state.

Config.Name: Internal Address
Config.Description: Required! Full URL including protocol and port (e.g., http://192.168.1.1:8080). Must be reachable by Radarr/Sonarr/LazyLibrarian on your network.

Config.Name: External Address
Config.Description: Optional. For reverse proxy setups only. Always protect external access with basic auth!

Config.Name: Discord Webhook
Config.Description: Optional. Discord webhook URL for notifications about CAPTCHA links and download status.

Config.Name: Hostnames URL
Config.Description: Optional. Public raw text URL containing valid hostnames (one per line as 'key = value'). Visit quasarr-hostnames.pages.dev for a guide, or search pastebin.com for 'hostnames quasarr'. Must be HTTP/HTTPS raw text, not HTML or JSON.

Config.Name: Silent Mode
Config.Description: Optional. Set to True to silence all Discord notifications except SponsorsHelper errors.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Optional. Set to True to enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Optional. Your timezone (e.g., America/New_York). Incorrect timezone can cause HTTPS/SSL certificate validation issues.
